articles.description: Bhabhiji Ghar Par Hai actor Saumya Tandon, who used to play Anita Bhabhi, in the popular show has now urged fans to help Deepesh Bhan's family in paying the home loan. Actor Deepesh passed away on July 23 and was known for playing Malkhan in the sitcom.
